title: "You are still in game"
body: So I just finished a game and I get the "You are already in a game, please reconnect" screen when I check the client. Rito pls respond. Clicking on the reconnect button just takes me to a blank loading screen followed by it saying it cannot find the game. Logging out does nothing either.

replies.body: I am having this problem too. the game finished and asked if I would like to wait for the statistics. I hit no and then I could not enter another game as it said I am in a game aready, when I try and reconnect the game will not connect(black screen) reseted router and everything but game is still bugged
